paper_title.en: Determination of elemental and ionic compositions for diesel exhaust particles by particle induced x-ray emission and ion chromatography analysis

description.en:
The purpose of this study is to clarify the chemical characterization of PM2.5 and PM10 in diesel exhaust particles (DEP). Sampling of PM2.5 and PM10 in DEP was carried out in November 1999 using an automobile exhaust testing system at the National Traffic Safety and Environment Laboratory, with a diesel truck (engine type: direct injection, displacement: 7961 cc, carrying weight: 2020 kg, equivalent inertia weight: 5600 kg) placed on a chassis dynamometer. Sampling conditions included idling, constant speed of 40 km/h, M-15 test pattern and 60%-revolution/40%-load of maximum power. Samples were collected on a polycarbonate membrane filter (Nuclepore®, pore size: 0.8 μm) using a MiniVol Portable Air Sampler (Airmetrics Co., Inc.). The concentrations of several elemental and ionic species in the PM2.5 and PM10 samples were determined by particle induced X-ray emission (PIXE) and ion chromatography analysis. PIXE analysis of the PM2.5 and PM10 samples revealed 15 elements, of which Na, Mg, Si, S, Cl, Ca, Fe and Zn were found to be the major components. Ionic species were Cl-, NO2-, NO3-, SO42-, Na+, NH4+, K+ and Ca2+. Concentrations of elements and ionic species under the sampling condition of 60%-revolution/40%-load were highest in comparison with those of the other sampling conditions. The elemental and ionic species data were compared for PM2.5 and PM10
 PM2.5 concentrations were 70% or more of PM10 concentrations for the majority of elements, and concentrations of ionic species in PM2.5 and PM10 were almost identical.

work_title.en: PIXE measurement of human hairs from a small-scale mining site of the Philippines.

research_project_title.ja: PIXE法(加速器を用いた微量元素分折)の医学・生物学への応用

description.ja: PIXE法により、あらゆる分野のあらゆる試料（個体・液体・気体・粉体・1mg以下の微小試料等）に対する定量分析法を開発し、それを他分野における研究に応用する。

research_project_title.ja: 大気PIXEを用いた生きた植物試料に対する定量分析法の開発

description.ja: Bangladeshなど、灌漑用水が重元素により汚染されている地域において、農作物の可食部への有害元素の移行を減少させる農耕法・品種改良などの研究がおこなわれている。そのため生きたままの農作物にビームを当て、定量分析を行う方法を開発することにより、自らの有害元素の移行を経時的に調べる銃弾となる。

research_project_title.ja: PIXEを用いたオイル試料大気中定量分析法（内部標準法及び無標準法）の開発とその大気環境学への 応用

description.ja: エンジンオイルは、ナノ粒子発生源として注目を集めているが、真空中での分析が不可能であり、大気中での分析が要求される。その正確な定量分析法を開発する。

research_project_title.en: Development of the method of quantitative analysis of engine oil samples by means of in-air PIXE.

description.en: Components in engine oils have been attracting attention as a source of nano particles. In this work, the method of quantitative analysis of engine oils by means of in-air PIXE is developed and applied to various samples.

research_project_title.ja: PIXEを用いたヒヅメ、羽毛試料の無調製定量分析法の開発と、その獣医学・環境評価学への応用。

description.ja: 無調製のヒヅメ・羽毛試料の定量分析法を開発し、家畜の健康評価・診断への応用を検討する。さらに野鳥の羽毛分析により、広域的な有害元素汚染の状況を調査する。

research_project_title.ja: PIXEを用いた超微小臓器試料定量分析法の微少臨床検体試料・小動物微小臓器試料への応用

description.ja: 医学研究に臓器試料分析は重要であるが、実験用小動物の微小臓器、生検で採取された微小検体など、1mg以下の試料に関しては、定量分析が困難であった。本研究においては「無標準法」を応用し、それらの微小組織試料定量分析法の開発を行った。今後は臨床検体試料、小実験動物の臓器試料への応用を試みる。

research_project_title.en: Development of the method of quantitative analysis of untreated coronet and feather samples taken from domestic animals and wild birds.

description.en: The method of quantitative analysis of untreated coronet and feather samples taken from domestic animals and wild birds is developed and applied to veterinary medicine and environmental sciences. The latter has been performed from the viewpoint of environmental contamination by toxic elements.

research_project_title.en: Development of the method of quantitative analysis of organ samples of extremely small quantities taken from real patients and experimental animals.

description.en: Organ samples of less than 1mg taken from small experimental animals or from real patients by biopsy have been hardly quantitatively analyzed. In this work, the method of quantitative analysis of small organ samples of less than 1mg is developed and applied to clinical and foundamental medicines.

research_project_title.ja: PIXEを用いた農作物、水産食品等の栄養学試料に対する定量分析法の開発とその応用、特に有害元素の分析によるリスク評価
PIXEを用いた大気浮遊粉塵、飲料水、河川水、海水、土、灰、植物等の環境科学試料に対する定量分析法の開発とその応用

research_project_title.en: Development of the method of quantitative analysis of sitological samples such as farm products and sea foods.
Development of the method of quantitative analysis of environmental samples such as aerosol, soil, drink water, river water, sea water and plants by means of PIXE.

research_project_title.ja: PIXE法を用いた、フィリピン,モンゴル,バングラデッシュ,カザフスタン、中国における毒性元素の環境汚染,体内暴露に関する調査研究

research_project_title.en: Studies for investigating contaminated environments by some toxic elements in Philippines, Mongolia, Bangladesh, kazakhstan and China using PIXE.
Application of PIXE to Medicine and Biology.
